hero.title: Staying in Bern
hero.subtitle: Human Connection First
hero.description: Build lasting friendships in Bern. Join a welcoming community where authentic connections happen naturally.

video.title: Discover Our Community
video.description: Where locals and volunteers come together to create meaningful connections in the heart of Bern.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Staying in Bern is a communal home where connection comes first. Locals and volunteers meet to share meals, laughter, music, and everyday moments in a safe, inclusive space. Volunteers keep the house alive and welcoming, creating a family-like atmosphere where everyone: families, LGBTQ+, people of all backgrounds can feel at home and part of something shared.

authenticConnections.title: Authentic Connections
authenticConnections.description: Foster genuine relationships beyond surface-level interactions

communityIntegration.title: Community Integration
communityIntegration.description: Help travellers/volunteers feel at home while enriching local perspectives

culturalExchange.title: Cultural Exchange
culturalExchange.description: Celebrate diversity and learn from different backgrounds

humanConnectionFirst.title: Human Connection First
humanConnectionFirst.description: Meals, laughter, music, and conversation are at the heart of everything we do.

inclusivity.title: Inclusivity
inclusivity.description: All ages, identities, cultures, and backgrounds are welcome.

respect.title: Respect
respect.description: We share space with care, balancing individual needs and the community's well-being.

simplicity.title: Simplicity
simplicity.description: No hidden agendas, no commercial push, just a space to meet, share, and belong.

location.title: Why Bern?
location.subtitle: Discover the charm of Switzerland's capital through the eyes of locals and the hearts of our community.

socialEvents.title: Social Events
socialEvents.description: Take part in Language Exchange and Social meetups to discover hidden local gems together.

alpineAdventures.title: Alpine Adventures
alpineAdventures.description: Explore the stunning Swiss Alps and countryside with your new local friends.

richCulture.title: Rich Culture
richCulture.description: Experience Bern's UNESCO World Heritage old town and vibrant cultural scene.

benefits.title: What's in it for You?
benefits.subtitle: Whether you're a local wanting to share your city or a volunteer seeking authentic connections, our community offers something special for everyone.

forLocals.title: For Locals
forLocals.description: Share your love for Bern while gaining fresh perspectives. Help travellers/volunteers feel at home and build meaningful friendships that enrich your own life.
benefits: Meet interesting people from around the world
Rediscover your city through new eyes
Make a positive impact in your community

forVolunteers.title: For Volunteers
forVolunteers.description: Experience authentic Swiss culture through genuine local connections. Skip the tourist traps and discover Bern like a true local.
benefits: Feel supported in your new environment

forUnderrepresented.title: Underrepresented Groups
forUnderrepresented.description: Families, LGBTQ+, people of colour, different faiths, all ages, who deserve spaces where they feel included and valued. Join a community where lasting connections flourish. Experience the joy of authentic relationships that go beyond cultural boundaries.

testimonials.title: Stories from Our Community
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from locals and volunteers who have experienced the magic of authentic human connections in Bern.
testimonials.cta: Ready to create your own story?

items.name: Sarah Chen
items.content: Staying in Bern transformed my experience in Switzerland. Through this community, I didn't just visit Bern - I truly lived it. The locals I met became lifelong friends who showed me hidden gems I never would have discovered on my own.

items.name: Marcus Weber
items.content: Hosting volunteers through this platform has been incredibly rewarding. I've learned so much about different cultures while sharing my love for Bern. It's amazing how these connections have enriched my own perspective of my hometown.

items.name: Monica Rodriguez
items.content: Staying in Bern is an amazing first experience for me. To know people of the another countries and interchange the culture and the languages while stay in a beautifull city like Bern, is very interesting. In few days I learned a lot about the comunications skills, that are the keys for made the world in general one best place.

footer.tagline: Building bridges between locals and volunteers in Bern, Switzerland. Creating authentic connections that last a lifetime.
